title: roasted rutabaga with winter herbs
directions: peel rutabagas and cut into 3/4 inch cubes
toss with oil, savory and 2-inch pieces of thyme and rosemary
line 2 large baking sheets with parchment
spread rutabaga and roast turning every 10 minutes until soft, about 50-60 minutes
switch oven positions about halfway through
remove large stems of herbs and serve with thyme garnish
ingredients: 1 Tbsp dried leaf savory or 8 sprigs fresh winter savory
